org.kepler.dataproxy.datasource.opendap

Class TypeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.dataproxy.datasource.opendap.TypeMapper

  • public class TypeMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a mapping between DAP2 data types and teh kepler data model for use in configuring output ports on an Actor.
    Since:
    Kepler 1.0RC1 User: ndp Date: Aug 8, 2007 Time: 9:12:03 AM
    Author:
    Nathan Potter

    • Method Detail

      • mapDDSToTypeList

        public static java.util.Vector mapDDSToTypeList(opendap.dap.DDS dds,
                                                boolean addMetadataRecord)
                                         throws IllegalActionException
        Maps a DAP2 DDS object to a list of kepler data types.
        Parameters:
        dds - The DDS to map to kepler.
        addMetadataRecord - controls whether or not dap Attribute metadata is added to the returned kepler records.
        Returns:
        A collection (Vector) of kepler data types that represent the top level variables in the passed DDS.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - When bad things happen.

      • mapDapObjectToType

        public static Type mapDapObjectToType(opendap.dap.BaseType dapBT,
                                      boolean addMetadataRecord)
                               throws IllegalActionException
        Maps a DAP2 variable (which is represented as an opendap.dap.BaseType to a kepler data Type.
        Parameters:
        dapBT - The DAP2 variable to map.
        addMetadataRecord - controls whether or not dap Attribute metadata is added to the returned kepler records.
        Returns:
        The corresponding Kepler Type
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - When bad things happen.

        public static java.lang.String replacePeriods(java.lang.String str)
